alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 10:01PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Vilas and northwestern Oneida Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1000 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Winchester to near Willow Lake. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eagle River, Lac Du Flambeau, Boulder Junction, Winchester, Border Lakes Natural Area, Squirrel Lake, Johnson Lake Barrens Natural Area, Willow Lake, Rainbow Flowage and Rice Creek Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
